name: ENT Surgical
tag_list: myringotomy, ent--surgical, medical-device, israeli-startup, naiot-venture-accelerator, naiot
overview:
ENT-Surgical (http://www.ent-surgical.com), has developed the Myringoâ„¢ device, which is designed to enable the performance of Myringotomy and tube insertion in a Non-OR setting, under local anesthesia, within up to 40 seconds.

Ventilation tube insertion is a surgical procedure in which a small ventilation tube is inserted through an incision made in the eardrum, a procedure termed myringotomy. This incision allows proper drainage of fluid from the middle ear.

Myringotomy is the most common surgical procedure in pediatrics, with over 1.1 million procedures performed a year in the U.S. alone.

For easy reference, here is a link to a 3 min video about the procedure and the Myringo device â€“ http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NdR-ZO-u9V4
